title: Astana Qazaqstan Devo Rider Hit with Four-Year Ban After Testing Positive for EPO Variant
content:
UCI confirms 22-year-old Kazakh racer Ilkhan Dostiyev will be ineligible through 2028 after returning two positive tests for the CERA blood booster.

Read the full article at Astana Qazaqstan Devo Rider Hit with Four-Year Ban After Testing Positive for EPO Variant on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
